title: Embracing the Unique Aspects of Male and Female, Part 3
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Larry Crabb
itunes:summary: As a husband, you play a special role in loving your wife. Your marriage can thrive when you choose to love her in a God-honoring way. Greg and John describe how they've learned to show love to their wives. Receive the book Fully Alive with your gift of any amount!
